name: Knorr Rice Sides Cheddar Broccoli Rice Cooks in 7 Minutes No Artificial Flavors, 5.7 oz
shortDescription: Treat your taste buds to Knorr Rice Sides Cheddar Broccoli. Your family is sure to love the flavor of our Rice Sides Cheddar Broccoli, our rice and pasta blend that expertly combines broccoli florets with the creamy goodness of a cheddar cheese sauce. On top of tasting delicious, our Cheddar Broccoli rice side dish is quick and easy to prepare. Knorr rice side dishes cook in just 7 minutes on the stovetop or in the microwave, and they’re perfect as the base for a delicious main dish or as a standalone rice side dish. Make Knorr Rice Sides the foundation of a crowd-pleasing dinner or an easy meal.

name: Slim Jim Original Smoked Snack Sized Sticks Pantry Pack, 0.28 oz. Meat Sticks, 46-ct Box
shortDescription: Experience intense  smoky flavor with a delicious Slim Jim Original Smoked Snack Stick Pantry Pack. Made with beef, pork and chicken, these irresistible meat sticks contain no artificial flavors or colors for full meaty flavor everyone can love. Each savory snack stick serving is loaded with 6 grams of protein, ideal for protein snacks that kick hunger to the curb and leave you feeling satisfied. These individually wrapped snacks go where you go and are perfect as travel snacks, school snacks or anywhere meat snacks. Slim Jim Original Snack Size Sticks offer a bold and tasty way to take on the day and make great pantry food items. This pantry pack box contains 46 individual snacks, so you are ready to clap back when savory cravings hit. Snap into a Slim Jim!

name: Great Value 100% Orange Juice, 10 fl oz, 6 Count
shortDescription: Orange Juice from Concentrate with Vitamin CGreat Value Orange 100% Juice six-count pack is the perfect solution for busy individuals who want to enjoy the wholesome taste of orange juice with the convenience of single-serving bottles. Each 10-ounce bottle contains 100% daily value of vitamin C, making this juice a healthy and refreshing choice. Pack individual bottles in lunch boxes, gym bags, backpacks, and coolers for a convenient and healthy drink option on the go, or add to your favorite fruit smoothie for a little extra punch. Since the six-count pack doesn't require refrigeration until after opening, you can stock up for school parties, sporting events, and camping trips. For maximum enjoyment, chill and shake before serving. This kosher and fat-free beverage is sure to satisfy just about anyone. Great Value Orange 100% Juice six-count pack delivers convenient and enjoyable refreshment at home and on the go!Great Value products provide families with affordable, high quality grocery and household consumable options. With our wide range of product categories spanning grocery and household consumables, we offer you a variety of products for your family's needs. Our products are conveniently available online and in Walmart stores nationwide, allowing you to stock up and save money at the same time.

name: Dole All Natural 100% Pineapple Juice Can, 6 fl oz, 6 Count
shortDescription:
Enjoy the refreshing taste of 100% pineapple juice!

Dole 100% Pineapple Juice is packed in an easy-to-open can, keeping it fresh and ready to be enjoyed at any time. Rich in Vitamin C and made with no added sugar, Dole Pineapple Juice is made with the nutritional goodness of real fruit, making it the ideal tropical fruit juice to enjoy on its own or mixed in cocktails, mocktails, or smoothies. With Dole's shelf-stable products, you can have the delicious taste of refreshing fruit anywhere, anytime.

name: Ocean Spray® White Cran-Strawberry Juice Drink, 64 fl oz Bottle
shortDescription: Sweeten the moment with Ocean Spray® White Cran-Strawberry Juice Drink. Light and refreshing meets crisp and bold with this blend of white cranberry and strawberry juices. This fruit juice beverage packs 100% of your recommended daily value of vitamin C in a single serving. Enjoy the sweet, tasty flavor of white cranberry juice and strawberry juice concentrate. Did we mention Ocean Spray® White Cran-Strawberry Juice Drink is made with no high fructose corn syrup? It's truly a win-win. Use this cranberry juice drink as a cocktail mixer for elevated drinks, or serve it cold on its own. White Cranberry makes a delicious, unique addition to blended beverages and ice pops, too. Go ahead and get creative. This juice drink won't let you down. All this made possible by the 700+ cranberry farming families that make up our co-op. Our owners. Our heartbeat. Our inspiration. Ocean Spray believes in the power of the mighty cranberry; Born Tart. Raised Bold.™

name: Minute Instant White Rice, Light and Fluffy, 42 oz
shortDescription:

Minute Instant White Rice is classic white rice known for its distinctive light and fluffy texture. Fast and delicious, Minute Instant White Rice contains one ingredient: rice. Mix it up and make it yours by seasoning it and eating it by itself or eating it alongside chicken, meat, vegetables, or any recipes you have in mind! Ready in only five minutes, you can spend less time cooking and have more time to enjoy all the moments that happen when you slow down. Minute Instant White Rice is cholesterol-free, made without MSG and preservatives, Non-GMO Project Verified, and Certified Gluten-Free.

name: Mahatma Authentic Saffron Yellow Rice, Seasoned Rice with Spices, 10 oz Bag
shortDescription:
Mahatma Rice Unites

Mahatma Authentic Saffron Yellow Rice is blended with spices, onions, and garlic. When cooking rice, the long grain rice granules maintain their separate, long shape and become fluffy, so you can use them alongside your favorite rice dishes, like burritos, tacos, and Spanish-inspired paella. This rice recipe isn't too spicy, plus it's fat-free, cholesterol-free, and made without added preservatives. Mahatma Authentic Saffron Yellow Rice is Certified Gluten-Free and Certified Kosher by Star-K.

name: Town House Original Oven Baked Crackers, 20.7 oz

Made with delicious ingredients, they're cholesterol free (3g polyunsaturated fat, 1g monounsaturated fat) and low in saturated fat (contains 5g total fat per serving); Every box of savory crackers is an invitation to explore all kinds of exciting ingredient combinations, ready to take your moments with family and friends over the top. name: Goldfish Elf Maple Syrup Flavored Graham Crackers, Snack Crackers, 6.1 oz Bag
shortDescription: New limited-edition Goldfish Elf Maple Syrup Flavored Graham Crackers will bring smiles and spread holiday cheer to snack time just in time for the beloved holiday movie's 20th Anniversary. You’ll find irresistibly delicious taste in every fun-shaped bite of our new seasonal graham crackers. Enjoy flavors of sweet brown sugar and butter, with the taste of caramel and vanilla, inspired by syrup - one of the elves' four main food groups. The 6.1-ounce bag is the perfect snack for your Elf movie watch party with family and friends, or for a sweet afternoon snack anytime the mood hits. They also make a great stocking stuffer or are ready for sharing at your next holiday get-together. These limited-edition maple syrup graham crackers featuring traditional Goldfish and iconic shapes inspired by Buddy the Elf will spark holiday cheer in everyone. New limited-edition Goldfish Elf Maple Syrup Flavored Graham Crackers. Go for the handful!

name: All Natural* 80% Lean/20% Fat Ground Beef Chuck, 1 lb Tray
shortDescription: There's nothing like cooking from scratch, especially when you start with All Natural* 80% Lean/20% Fat Ground Beef Chuck Tray. Made with quality USDA inspected beef and no artificial ingredients, our all natural* ground beef is juicy, tender and wet aged for flavor. Our beef is an excellent source of protein, vitamin B6, vitamin B12, zinc, niacin, selenium and a good source of phosphorous, riboflavin and iron. All 9 essential nutrients are naturally found in beef and are a flavorful way to give your body nutrients to help power through the day. Great for sautéing or grilling, our ground beef is a delicious addition to your favorite recipes. Simply cook and serve with asparagus, bow tie pasta and pesto sauce for a hearty weeknight dinner. Includes one All Natural* 80% Lean/20% Fat Ground Beef Chuck Tray. *Minimally processed, no artificial ingredients

name: Great Value All Natural Chicken Wing Sections, 4 lb (Frozen)
shortDescription: Bring home the taste of game day with all-natural* Great Value Chicken Wing Sections.  Our chickens are raised with no added hormones,** and these ice glazed, individually frozen chicken wing sections are ready to cook. Our all-natural* chicken is juicy and tender with 19g of protein and 0g of trans fat per serving. Simply bake or grill anytime to crispy perfection. Toss with buffalo or garlic parmesan sauce and serve with celery and carrots for a classic, crowd-pleasing appetizer. These are the perfect size for dipping into your favorite condiment. Bake and finish on the grill for perfectly charred wings that pair with corn on the cob and chipotle dip. For a special occasion, get creative and baste in a honey-garlic sauce for a twist. Includes one 4 lb reclosable package of all-natural* chicken wing sections. *Minimally processed, no artificial ingredients **Federal regulations prohibit the use of added hormones or steroids in chicken

With crunchy ridges and epic inspired flavors, RUFFLES potato chips bring snack satisfaction and big taste to any moment.
